mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, John Augustine Washington to Jane C. Washington, 1845 February 18
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, John Augustine, III, 1821-1861
mdRecord.dcterms:description: John Augustine Washington writes from Mount Vernon to his mother at Blakeley regarding farm news - 40 wagon loads of ice from pond, mild temperatures; slave (Alfred) repeatedly running off; family matters. Autograph letter signed, 3 pages, third page is partially torn and missing.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Elswyth Thane Beebe Collection of Washington Family Papers
